reviews.review: It's Verry good play on steam boys

Pretty shitty game now TBH. Started playing this game back in 2016 when it actually costed money. Now all these broke bitches who downloaded the game for free just cheat every single FUCKING MATCH! It's honestly pathetic. Like yea, it's so hard to play a game where you just point and click. And use your brain from time to time. Really sad to see a game I basically grew up playing and enjoyed just go to shit because of these brain dead peasant fucks.

Look fam, we had enough fun with this game like 4-5 years ago right? Well its not fun anymore. This game feels like outdated compared to current games. IT IS NO FUN.

Speaking as a new player in 2022.
Just... just don't. Unless you're down to get absolutely pooped on for not knowing a whole lot of very, very old game knowledge, it's not worth trying to get into it this late in the game's lifespan. Everyone in ranked and casuals expects you to know every little thing about every map and weapon, and when you don't they turn on you like ravenous Siberian bears. Even if this game lives on for another 10 years, I wouldn't recommend anybody start playing just now. You're better off in Siege or Valorant.
